metadata.title: CVE-2024-27033 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:fix to remove unnecessary f2fs_bug_on() to avoid panic verify_blkaddr()will trigger panic once we inject fault into f2fs_is_valid_blkaddr(), fixto remove this unnecessary f2fs_bug_on().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
